title: 5.0.22 -> 5.0.24 - failed to update database structure (mdb2 error: unknown error, _doquery: [error message: could not execute statement]
body:
dear owncloud community,

excited on updating my owncloud professional server, i've updated to the 5.0.13 (from 5.0.12 version) through ssh command.
once done, i've received in my logs the following entries:
````
warning 	core 	starting upgrade from 5.0.22 to 5.0.24 	2013-11-05t14:00:36+00:00

fatal 	core 	failed to update database structure (mdb2 error: unknown error, _doquery: [error message: could not execute statement] [last executed query: alter table `oc_locks` change `id` `id` int unsigned not null auto_increment primary key, change `timeout` `timeout` int unsigned default 0, change `created` `created` bigint default 0, change `scope` `scope` tinyint default 0, change `depth` `depth` tinyint default 0] [native code: 1068] [native message: multiple primary key defined] ) 

````

apparently, in the config.php file, i can see the following version.
  'version' => '5.0.24' through 5.0.13 install.

do you know how i can fix the db error?

thank you for your help and best regards,
pouif
